name: The Pong Must Go On
description:
The ages have been hard on the pong, now it doesn't have any more players. So, it decided to play by itself. Though there is a problem, it can run out of energy

You play as a robot whose goal is to stop the pong's energy from running out, redirect the pong ball with your bat to collect energies. Use SPACE or LEFT CLICK to enter the attacking state and WASD to move

A game made in 3 days for the PongJam by Ardkil

Music

Kevin macleod - Blip Stream
Eric Skiff - a night of dizzy spells

Font

Free Pixel Font - Thaleah | 2D Fonts | Unity Asset Store

Everything else

Me
